head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths FISCHEL, MARJORIE S.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths FISCHEL, MARJORIE S.

block.p: FISCHEL-Marjorie S., Weston, CT, on March 24. Much loved by grandson Noah Fischel, son Alwyn Fischel, Jr., daughters Catherine Schlossberg and Sally Fischel; fondly remembered by stepdaughters Phyllis Tannous, Constance Kappel, stepson Arnold Fischel. ''I have known sadness, I have known great joy, I have known love. With all these wonderful possessions, I am rich, and cannot be trapped in an ailing body or a distraught mind''. Memorial donations to Guide Dog Foundation for the Blind or to Mid Fairfield Hospice appreciated.
